overview: Thomas (Tom) Alexander is Chairman of PK4. Mr. Alexander is a serial entrepreneur, having founded and successfully built a number of start-ups in Northern California. Mr. Alexanderâ€™s recent companies include Intransa (as CEO) and LuxN (as President and Co-founder, led its acquisition by Sorrento Networks). Prior to founding LuxN, Mr. Alexander headed the telecom/datacom investment portfolio in a Silicon Valley-based venture capital firm and, previously, headed Sales and Marketing at Infotron Systems, a successful data communications start-up. Mr. Alexander also served as Entrepreneur-In-Residence with US Venture Partners (USVP), one of the largest and best-known VC firms in the Valley, and has deep relationships with key individuals in the technology community. He regularly advises new and existing entrepreneurial ventures in the Silicon Valley. Mr. Alexander is a Harvard Business School alumnus and also holds a Master of Science (MS) from Rutgers University and a Bachelor of Engineering (BE) from Guindy Engineering College, Madras, India.
